author: tersec
content: Potential gap in consensus spec tests, `upgrade_to_electra` not copying `blob_gas_used` or `excess_blob_gas` but instead setting them unconditionally to 0 passes all the Electra fork and transition tests (which is, in theory, all of them) Nimbus runs
